Text: Una muy buena peli argentina. Altamente recomendable.

This movie couldn`t be better.  Ricardo Darin is just amazing (9 Reinas, XXY, el Aura, El hijo de la novia) .  With an exquisit story, a remarkable performance from the cast, we can say that the Argentinean Cinema has pulled it`s best in the making of this film, definetely a candidate to the Oscar for best foreign language film.
